oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Contract between mistress and her former slaves
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Contract signed by former Caruthers slaves--Thomas, Rhoda, Harriet, & Dempsey--releasing "our former mistress," Francis Caruthers, from paying for any further expenses for their care now that they are free. Release is made "in consideration of the care; and attention exercised over us and our families and the maintenance of the same by our former mistress since colored people have had a right to contract for themselves." The parties were all from Obion County, Tennessee from the area around Troy.
